name: part_008
file: tmp_【 #大空スバル５周年 】大空スバル５周年記念ライブ ～ 5th Anniversary Live Stellar Symphony ～【ホロライブ⧸大空スバル】 [GEgMPHX6_c8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Oozora Subaru and Hololive Gen 2 members perform 'Starlight'.
Oozora Subaru and Hololive Gen 2 members perform 'Our Bright Parade'.

subtitles.original:
スターライト
作詞・作曲：DIVELA
subtitles.english:
Starlight
Lyrics & Music: DIVELA

subtitles.original: 描いた　未知のキャンバス　重ねる景色
subtitles.english: The canvas of the unknown I've painted, the overlapping scenery

subtitles.original: 繋いでみて　繰り返してくショット
subtitles.english: Try connecting them, the repeating shots

subtitles.original: 揺らいだ　目の前に広がる世界
subtitles.english: The world spreading out before my wavering eyes

subtitles.original: 星屑のメロディ　歌に乗せた
subtitles.english: A melody of stardust, put into song

subtitles.original: クラった鮮やかに　眩ませるように
subtitles.english: Struck by the brightness, as if to dazzle

subtitles.original: 駆け抜けるよ　スターライト
subtitles.english: I'll run through, Starlight

subtitles.original: We can fight　そう僕らは　いつしか　夢の中惹かれて
subtitles.english: We can fight, yes, we were drawn into the dream before we knew it

subtitles.original: ただがむしゃらに　走り続けたよ
subtitles.english: I just kept running recklessly

subtitles.original: 無限の宇宙に　響いた　君を照らす声は
subtitles.english: Resonating in the infinite universe, the voice that shines on you

subtitles.original: どこへだってキラリ　飛んで行けるんだ
subtitles.english: Will sparkle anywhere, able to fly anywhere

subtitles.original: 愉快な　仲間と歩いた非日常
subtitles.english: The extraordinary days I walked with cheerful friends

subtitles.original: 掴んでみて　指先の糸先
subtitles.english: Try grabbing it, the thread at my fingertips

subtitles.original: 滲んでいく　目の前に広がった限界は
subtitles.english: The limits that spread before my blurring eyes

subtitles.original: みんなの声重ねて　ぶっ壊して
subtitles.english: I'll overlap everyone's voices and smash through them

subtitles.original: 吸い込まれそうな　夜空を見上げて
subtitles.english: Looking up at the night sky that seems to suck me in

subtitles.original: 今叫ぶよ　スターライト
subtitles.english: I'll shout it now, Starlight

subtitles.original: I wanna be　そう僕らは　いつでも　そばで笑い合って
subtitles.english: I wanna be, yes, we were always laughing together by each other's side

subtitles.original: 溢れる声が　遠く木霊する
subtitles.english: Our overflowing voices echo far away

subtitles.original: 願いの欠片を　灯した　君の腕を引いて
subtitles.english: Lighting up the fragments of our wishes, I'll pull your arm

subtitles.original: どこへだってキラリ　飛んで行けるんだ
subtitles.english: Will sparkle anywhere, able to fly anywhere

subtitles.original: ちょっと不安な日も　魔法をかけてハッピー
subtitles.english: Even on slightly anxious days, cast a spell and be happy

subtitles.original: 百人力で乗り越えていけた
subtitles.english: With the strength of a hundred, we could overcome it

subtitles.original: あどあぶるに染まる　大空目掛けた
subtitles.english: Dyed in adorable, aimed for the great sky

subtitles.original: 鼓動が弾んでく
subtitles.english: Our heartbeats are bouncing

subtitles.original: We can fly　そう僕らは　この日を　ずっと待ってたんだ
subtitles.english: We can fly, yes, we've been waiting for this day forever

subtitles.original: まだ冷めないで
subtitles.english: Please don't cool down yet

subtitles.original: スターライト　僕らは　止まらない　その光が消える
subtitles.english: Starlight, we won't stop, until that light fades

subtitles.original: 一秒前まで　走り続けるよ
subtitles.english: I'll keep running until the very last second

subtitles.original: 無限の宇宙に　響いた　君を照らす声を
subtitles.english: Resonating in the infinite universe, the voice that shines on you

subtitles.original: 強く抱いてキラリ　輝いて行け
subtitles.english: Hold it tight and sparkle, go on shining

subtitles.original: Yeah...
subtitles.english: Yeah...

subtitles.original: Parade, Parade, Parade!　輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Parade, Parade, Parade! It's shining

subtitles.original: 呼び合う声を合図に
subtitles.english: With our voices calling to each other as the signal

subtitles.original: Parade, Parade, Parade!　探しにゆく
subtitles.english: Parade, Parade, Parade! We're going to search

subtitles.original: スタートは　何度だって
subtitles.english: The start is anytime

subtitles.original:
Our Bright Parade
作詞・作曲・編曲：堀江晶太
subtitles.english:
Our Bright Parade
Lyrics, Music, & Arrangement: Shota Horie

subtitles.original: ただ、独り言を綴った
subtitles.english: I just wrote down my monologues

subtitles.original: ただ、始まりたくて走った
subtitles.english: I just ran because I wanted to begin

subtitles.original: 遠く、暗がりに灯った
subtitles.english: Far away, lit in the darkness

subtitles.original: それは、眩しすぎた名前
subtitles.english: That was a name far too bright
